glassmorphism.nav: bg-white/70 dark:bg-black/60 backdrop-blur-xl border-b border-white/20 dark:border-white/10
glassmorphism.card: bg-white/50 dark:bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/20 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

buttons.primary: rounded-full px-8 py-3 bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 transition-transform active:scale-95 shadow-lg
buttons.secondary: rounded-full px-8 py-3 bg-muted text-foreground hover:bg-muted/80 transition-transform active:scale-95
buttons.ghost: rounded-full px-6 py-2 hover:bg-accent/10 text-accent transition-colors

cards.event: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl border border-border bg-card p-6 hover:border-accent/50 transition-colors
cards.profile: flex flex-col items-center text-center p-6 rounded-xl bg-muted/30 hover:bg-muted/50 transition-colors

inputs.default: rounded-lg border-border bg-background px-4 py-2 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent/20 focus:border-accent transition-all

universal_guidelines: Fusion over Imitation: Mix academic prestige with tech innovation.
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel 'smart' and 'welcoming'.
Content is King: Prioritize event clarity and leadership accessibility.
Negative Space: Use generous padding (p-8, p-12) to avoid clutter.
Contrast: Ensure text is readable against Rice Blue backgrounds.
No Generic Gradients: Use texture or subtle noise instead of flat gradients.
Mobile First: Ensure all grids stack beautifully on mobile.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install dependencies: `npm install @phosphor-icons/react react-icons framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge`.
2. Update `tailwind.config.js` with the Rice Blue (#00205B) and Gray (#7C7E7F) palette.
3. Create a `Layout` component that includes the Glassmorphism Navbar and Footer.
4. Build the `Hero` section using the 'tech_abstract' image as a subtle background with a heavy blur or overlay.
5. Implement the `Events` section using a Bento Grid layout (large feature card + smaller list).
6. Use Shadcn `Calendar` for the Events page, customized to match the theme.
7. Ensure the Admin Dashboard is clean, high-density, and functional (Mode B grid).
8. Add a Dark Mode toggle in the Navbar.
